params.studio: Address of the studio contract to deregister

params.poaId: The PoA submission ID that's stuck

returns.timeRemaining: Seconds remaining before timeout (0 if timed out)

params.studioName: Name of the studio for identification

emergencyProcessConsensus(bytes32,addres.notice: Emergency function to process stuck submissions (owner only)

getPoAStatus(bytes32).notice: Get the final status of a PoA submission

isConsensusProcessed(bytes32).notice: Check if consensus has been processed for a submission

processConsensus(bytes32,address).notice: Process consensus for a PoA submission

registerStudio(address,string).notice: Register a studio contract with the DVN

startSubmissionProcessing(bytes32,addres.notice: Start processing a submission (called when a new submission is made)
